Title: Episode 2
Plot: Statham, when not drawing breasts upon his x-rays, is trying to make Joanna jealous with increasingly desperate pretend sexual exploits. Mac is back at work and, with no help from Guy, is causing Caroline grief as he can't remember the twenty minutes that they were an item. Meanwhile, Karen and Martin have moved on to the next level and she's wearing him out.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
Writer: Fay Rusling, Gary Howe, James Henry, Oriane Messina
GuestStars: Keir Charles, Darren Boyd, Robin Weaver, Pip Torrens, Oriane Messina, Robert Harley, Alistair Barrie
